Interface EntitySuiteInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Destroyer, Entity, PlayerShip, Projectile, Ship

    public interface EntitySuiteInterface
    This interface provides functionality commonly found in entities. This includes the ability to draw the entity, a collision detection method, and an ifCollided method, which is used by the entity subclasses to determine how that unique entity is affected by collision.
    Author:
    Andrew

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void detectCollision(Entity ent)
      This method is called by the GameEngine object to detect a collison for each entity.

      This method draws the entity.
      void ifCollided(Entity ent)

      void update()
      Moves this entity, and updates hardpoints attached to it

        void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2D,
        float interpolation)
        This method draws the entity. Takes a graphics2D context and a interpolation value for smooth rendering.

        g2D -
        interpolation -

      • detectCollision

        void detectCollision(Entity ent)
        This method is called by the GameEngine object to detect a collison for each entity.
        Parameters:
        ent - the entity that is to be checked for collisions with other entities.

      • ifCollided

        void ifCollided(Entity ent)
        What to do if the entity collides with another entity
        Parameters:
        ent - The entity that this entity instance collides with

        Moves this entity, and updates hardpoints attached to it
